Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, this film depicts our social history at the beginning of the Showa period when the ideological rule of Imperial Japan collapsed.
